content.raw:
[new jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/114/) using a release-tools branch that combines the following pull requests:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/185/use-ignition-transport-100-in-jenkins-jobs/diff
* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/186/install-libqwt-dev-for-gazebo8-and-up/diff
